评论详情: The outfit was very cute on my 8 month old that is 21.5 lbs, a little over 2 ft long.  The bow tie was a little long on the straps but the neck circumference was perfect.  Any smaller of a circumference and it would have been too tight around his neck to button the top button.  There would also not be any more room lengthwise in the onesie.  The pants were a little long but not to the point of looking funny.  He just isn’t a fan of hats these days & his head is in the high 70th percentile so he didn’t end up wearing the hat.  But it looked very dapper for the second he let us keep it on.  We ordered this outfit to go with our earthy tones family picture.

I feel like it runs slightly small (at least for my kids), but otherwise it’s perfect.  The bow tie snaps on both sides, it is super soft, quality material, and slightly stretchy .  I loved it so much I bought another 2, so my kids could match as they got bigger.  Would but again!
Outfit & Hat fit perfect!! He looked adorable in his first school pictures.
I bought this item for church apparel. It was my babies presentation outfit and it fit him perfectly at 3 months!

This litlle boy outfit is really perfect for shooting photo birthday, I just brought two for my twin boy  birthday and I really excited when I recieved the outfit I can't wait to dres the boys  for tje shouting photo ,the material is good, I love the comfort it fit really good in both.
Fits great but I did not receive the hat.
I bought 0-3 months; it would absolutely fit a 5-6 month old. Entirely too big and NOT true to size at all! The design is cute so I’ll give 2 stars.
Love it
La tela es estirable, la talla es correcta. Mi bb tiene 3 meces y pesa 14 libras. Talla de 3 a 6 le queda muy bien.
This outfit was so cute for our photoshoot! It fit true to size for us. Our only problem was the hat. It was pretty wrinkly and hard to unwrinkle. I recommend this for a cute outfit!
Cute outfit, purchased for wedding. Would recommend sizing up. The little hat must be comfortable, 1 year old forgot it was on and left it alone.
Very frustrated by the lack of cotton. Otherwise, very cute.

评论概述: Cute but runs small I think
评论详情: Very cute and received many compliments, but I think the size runs small. My baby was born a month early and was a preemie, and he is 11 months old now with 10 month old size. I ordered 12-18 months, and the top is already getting tight. The pants are not stretchy so I think he won’t be able to wear it for a long time.

评论概述: Cute but tie doesn’t snap on
评论详情: This outfit is cute and great quality but the seamstress is sewing on the snap to the tie incorrectly. They have 2 male connectors that don’t allow the buttons to snap the tie on. I ordered twice and they were both the same. The only reason I returned this.
So this outfit was super cute. It felt nice too.  I did return it because the color didn’t go with the the theme in which i purchased this item for.
Soft fabric, washes easily, great for multiple wears, true to size.
It's challenging to find a straightforward version of this. Most tuxedo-style clothes come in colors or patterns. However, the pants were cute, and I paired them with a simple top.
Missing suspenders & bowtie
For our niece’s newborn son. Good quality, fit was perfect and looked very nice
Absolutely adorable. This was a gift and momma loved it.

Used for a themed birthday! I put this on my son and it fit perfectly for 6 month sized clothing. The material is thick so if your baby runs hot this might be too thick for them. Otherwise the quality was on point and worth the price.
Worst sizing ever!  The pants are 0-3, shirt is 3-6 and hat is 6-9 months! 2 stars because it's cute but he can't wear this together because they are no where near being the same size

评论概述: It’s not as high quality looking in person as it looks in the pictures.
评论详情: The hat is really bad it looks like something you may put on a doll but not something you’d actually wear. Got this for pictures but returned it. It was a hot mess the buttons were not brown or white as pictured I know they said they could be different but they were white with writing and looked really off from the outfit. I don’t know I just really hated everything about it. Something are a hit on here somethings a miss. This was a miss.
The material is great! The bow tie snaps on and off. The outfit looks exactly like the picture!
The outfit was cute and fit as expected.
Ordered 12 month. Definitely not what I got. This would maybe fit a very thin 3-4 month old. I know I ordered the right size because the tag says 12 months. Super disappointed.

The sizing on this is way off.  I bought the 6-12 for my 8 month old and it was entirely way too big, like I mean SOOOO much bigger than what he is.  What is weird is the onesie fit him fine, but the pants were so big and long like they were meant for a baby much older than 1.  The hat was also way too big.
Bought this for my 2 month old to wear to a wedding and it was PERFECT 🤩

评论概述: Can’t wait to see him at his uncle’s wedding!
评论详情: The product is soft, unique, and appropriate for a casual day wedding.
Cute and decent quality just runs X-Large
